text.en: Homage to the compassionate guru!
text.en-trans: lama tukjé chen la chaktsal lo

text.en: With great renunciation, you cast aside conditioned existence.
text.en-trans: ngejung chenpö si lé rab gal né

text.en: You were guided your teacher, a virtuous spiritual friend,
text.en-trans: yongdzin gewé shé kyi jesu zung

text.en: And abandoned all mental afflictions and defilements—
text.en-trans: nyönmong zakpa tamché pangpa yi

text.en: Magnificent arhat, ‘foe destroyer’, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: drachom chenpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: As your wisdom mind filled with altruism and bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: zhenpen changchub sem gyi tukgyü tam

text.en: Your mastery of cherishing others above yourself meant that
text.en-trans: dakwé zhen ché jongwé rang sok kyang

text.en: You would not hesitate to sacrifice your own life for beings’s sake—
text.en-trans: semchen dönchir tong la mi zhumpa

text.en: Magnificent bodhisattva, heir of the victorious ones, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: gyalsé sempa chenpor solwa deb

text.en: The four empowerments refined the four aspects of your being,
text.en-trans: wang zhi lam gyi gyü zhi rab jang shing

text.en: And you guarded the samaya as dearly as your own life-force,
text.en-trans: damtsik dompa sok tar chepar kyang

text.en: So that self and other, world and inhabitants, arose as the four maṇḍalas—
text.en-trans: dakzhen nöchü kyilkhor zhi ru shar

text.en: Magnificent Vajradhara, ‘bearer of the adamantine sceptre’, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dorjé dzinpa chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Outwardly you uphold the Vinaya conduct of a śrāvaka disciple,
text.en-trans: chitar nyentö dulwé chöpa kyang

text.en: Inwardly you possess the liberating recognition of all beings as parents,
text.en-trans: nang du dro kün pamar shepé drol

text.en: Secretly you are the embodiment of great, co-emergent vajra bliss—
text.en-trans: sangwa lhenkyé dechen dorjé dak

text.en: Magnificent upholder of the three sets of vows, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dom sumden pa chenpor solwa deb

text.en: In your wisdom you directly perceive all knowable phenomena,
text.en-trans: khyenpé shejé chö kün ngönsum zik

text.en: In your love, you would happily brave the unbearable fires of hell,
text.en-trans: tsewé nyal mé zö kar jukpar tro

text.en: In your power, you destroy hosts of outer, inner and secret demons—
text.en-trans: nüpé chi nang sangwé dü tsok chom

text.en: Magnificent face and embodiment of the three families, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: rik sum dü zhal chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Among hosts of learned scholars your courageous eloquence prevails,
text.en-trans: khepé tsok kyi ü na pobpa to

text.en: Among all the adepts and yogins, you are the most resplendent,
text.en-trans: drubtob naljor kün gyi ü na ji

text.en: Your renown and reputation for noble deeds is far-reaching—
text.en-trans: zangpö dzepé drak nyen ring trowa

text.en: Gyaltsen Palzang, ‘splendid banner of victory’, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: gyaltsen pal zang zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Having transcended foolish meditation and speculative analysis,
text.en-trans: lün gom yichö lé dé chakgya zhi

text.en: You gained perfect realization of the four types of mudrā,
text.en-trans: tokpa jizhin ngön du gyurpa lé

text.en: Releasing the knots in your channels as you traversed paths and stages—
text.en-trans: tsa yi dü drol salam tarchinpé

text.en: Magnificent and mighty lord among yogins, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Through the force of my unshakeable confidence in you,
text.en-trans: dak ni khyé la miché depé tü

text.en: I reject feigned expression and pray from the depths of my heart.
text.en-trans: cham bü tsik pang nying né soltab pé

text.en: Through this may I be inspired with your blessings
text.en-trans: gönpo khyö kyi namtar malüpa

text.en: To accomplish every aspect of your fully liberated life.
text.en-trans: dak gi yongsu dzokpar jingyi lob
